title: பொன்னியின் செல்வன்: Complete set
description: Ponniyin Selvan is an acclaimed Tamil historical fiction epic. This is the complete Tamil version, all five volumes. Ponniyin Selvan is a 2400-page 20th-century Tamil historical novel written by Kalki Krishnamurthy. It narrates the story of Arulmozhivarman (later crowned as Rajaraja Chola I), one of the kings of the Chola Dynasty during the 10th and 11th centuries. Kalki Krishnamurthy finished the novel after nearly a period of three years and six months of writing and he visited Sri Lanka three times to learn some information to write this novel.
author: Kalki
